website_summaries.verdict: Choose this foam roller if you are looking for a compact, low-priced option for occasional use.
pros: Works well for releaving minimal muscle tightness
18-inch size is perfect for taking it along to workouts
cons: Tends to lose its shape and firmness with frequent, rigorous use

customer_reviews.title: Good roller.
customer_reviews.text: Roller shipped quickly and looks to be well made. Some at our gym look nice, but start to disintegrate after only a short time being used. Hopefully this one will last a while. Good size if you are limited in the amount of room you have to do your stretching. Also includes a brief guide on a few uses. If you go on YouTube you can find countless other demonstration videos.
customer_reviews.author: Billy M

customer_reviews.title: Chiropractor in a box!
customer_reviews.text: This little roller is an absolute wonder! I use it on my entire back whenever it feels painful or like something is sticking. After using it my back feels perfect! I can hear all the little pops up and down my spine as it goes back in place. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fern B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Irregular shape of the cylindrical roller causes uneven movement during use. Also, wife complains surface is too firm and unyielding.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It holds shape for all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It holds shape for all of my exercises. I use it daily and see no change in its appearance whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: COMan

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roller because my physical therapist recommended I buy one. It's great but hurts when I use it. This is NOT a defect of the product. I like the size for storage but it moves around a tiny bit when you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for those sore muscles! Excellent price for such an awesome product! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Marquisette

customer_reviews.title: This is great product for my back & this is the second ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great product for my back & this is the second one I've had, the first one finally just worn out.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: worth the $25
customer_reviews.text: This item was suggested to me from my chiropractor. It's a great item for those who do not have a partner to rub down the occasional sore muscle- a great DIY massager and worth the reasonable price of $25.
customer_reviews.author: jessia

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my pain and help me with some stretches. Thank you for your item hopefully it will help others
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Miller

customer_reviews.title: Foam Roller
customer_reviews.text: It is light and stiff and works well under load, easy to handle and store. I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Imran

product_meta.title: Pro-Tec Foam Roller 6"X18"
product_meta.description: The Pro-Tec foam roller is a great tool for stretching, promoting flexibility and myofascial release! It can help alleviate muscle and soft tissue tightness of the upper and lower back, IT band, hamstring, adductors, upper arm, and much more!
feature_bullets: Excellent Tool to Promote Flexibility and MyoFacial release.
